${modID}:TheCycleCompass.NAME: The Cycle Compass
${modID}:TheCycleCompass.FLAVOR: The volatile elements endlessly cycle, granting gifts of nature's power.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain the current bonus:
NL #yFlame: Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by #b1.
NL #yShadow: Heal #b2 HP and gain #b2 Cursed Block.
